lessonGuidance: Sometimes there will be sections of the board that are impossible to solve with patterns.
The only way to clear that section is to guess. This can be very frustrating and these sections should be saved until all tiles around them have been cleared.
Once you have guaranteed that a section can only be solved by guessing, all you can do is try to choose the tile that is least likely to be a bomb.
To do this, look at the numbered tiles around the hidden tiles. The numbers can give a hint as to which is a mine.
If the numbers give you no clue, just guess a tile that is surrounding with the lowest valued numbers.
